document.full_text: a north korean patrol boat briefly crossed a tense maritime border with rival south korea late on tuesday before retreating when the south's navy fired warning shots, the military said on wednesday.
document.title: north korea boat retreats after warning shots fired: south
lines_and_colors: a north korean patrol boat briefly crossed a tense maritime border with rival south korea late on tuesday before retreating when the south's navy fired warning shots, the military said on wednesday.
